ComicInfo.Summary:
Running out of ideas, Delirium and Dream meet with their brother Destiny, who gives Dream some information he may not want to hear. The siblings' search for their missing brother nears completion in "Brief Lives" Part 7!
General Notes
First issue under the Vertigo imprint.
Lady Johanna Constantine's gravestone is seen on the isle where Orpheus "lives"; born 1760, died 1859.
Although Orpheus is clearly present, alluded to and even conferred with by Dream, he is unseen and unnamed in the issue and his conversation with Dream takes place off-panel.
